job_description: Job Description: Brand Partnerships Manager Are you always the first to know about the hottest thing going on in culture, or what’s going to be the next viral trend on social media? Are you well-versed in trending or up and coming brands and would want to work on collab projects? Want to join a dynamic team and make a big impact at a rapidly growing company? Ready to spend your workday thinking about how to deliver fun experiences to our 50MM+ annual guests? If so, we’d love to talk to you! Dave & Buster’s is seeking an experienced Manager of Brand Partnerships who can help take our marketing plans to the next level with seriously cool collaborations with strong brand, influencer, or celebrity partnerships. We are looking for someone who keeps an eye on the latest trends and can recommend partnership activations that build brand relevance, and a creative thinker that isn’t afraid to push the bounds of entertainment to come up with big, bold ideas. · Work with Sr. Director of Brand Marketing to build brand partnership strategy across all business streams – Eat, Drink, Play and Watch – to build brand relevance. · Stay on top of trends in culture and proactively recommend partnership and/or activation ideas; be the brand steward and advocate of ‘culture hijacking.’ · Maintain relationships with existing partners, and cultivate new relationships with emerging brands that would be a good partner fit for D&B. · Negotiate and manage all aspects of partnership agreements to ensure flawless execution including trade and deal terms. · Create business briefs for partnership activations that help creative, media, and digital teams to create strong go-to-market marketing campaigns. · Serve as day-to-day project manager on partnership initiatives with the oversight of the Sr. Director, Brand Marketing. Effectively communicate and manage cross-functional teams and/or agency partners on project goals and deliverables. Responsible for on-time and on-budget delivery, contingency plans, and post-mortem learnings. · Act as a brand steward, having a deep knowledge of the brand architecture, positioning, and guest targets, and applying this consistently across all marketing activities. We’d love to hear from people who: · Dream big – we'll be counting on you to keep a pulse on the latest trends and think creatively about how to take Dave & Buster’s to the next level. · Act like a team player – you'll be working with lots of internal and external partners to bring projects to life. · Thrive in a fast-paced environment and are comfortable navigating ambiguity. · Believe that work should be fun! You’ll be joining a team that works hard but has fun along the way. Qualifications, Skills, & Abilities · 5+ years of experience in a partnerships role within a client organization or at a marketing agency · Experience working in the restaurant / hospitality industry is preffered · Strong organization, planning and presentation skills · Highly creative with strong skills in organizing teams into action · Ability to sell new ideas to leadership team · Ability to balance multiple priorities and meet deadlines · Strong analytical skills · Strong foundation of marketing and marketing fundamentals · Attention to detail – ability to flawlessly manage multiple programs. · Ability to work in fast-paced environment; accountable and flexible · Strong problem solving abilities; works well with ambiguity · Demonstrates the ability to balance immediate and long-term priorities: seeks to meet critical objectives while considering the impact of those decisions and activities on the ability to achieve long-term goals WHAT’S IN IT FOR ME?: Dave & Buster’s / Main Event is an imaginative and dynamic company dedicated to creating innovative entertainment experiences that bring joy, laughter, and excitement to people of all ages. Our mission is to foster a culture of fun and creativity, and we take pride in our commitment to delivering memorable and unique entertainment solutions. Exclusive discounts on food and games at Dave & Buster’s / Main Event Paid Time Off (PTO) that increases with tenure. 11 Company Holidays (Includes your Birthday) & 2 Floating Holidays per year. Medical, dental, vision and voluntary benefits Part Time/Full Time benefits available Sub Benefits: Livongo, SurgeryPlus, and Telehealth benefits 401k with company match following 6 months of employment. Buster’s Legacy Fund (Support Team Members during difficult Times) Employee Assistance Program (EAP) Offerings. Work out facility on-site. Employee Power Card | Free Video Games. We work hard, play hard and have FUN! Salary Range: 80640 - 107520 We are an equal opportunity employer and participate in E-Verify in states where required. Dave & Buster’s is different from everywhere else. No two days are ever the same. Time will fly by serving hundreds of people with flexible schedules you can accommodate school or other jobs. Plus your co-workers are awesome!

Qualifications: 5+ years of experience in a partnerships role within a client organization or at a marketing agency
Experience working in the restaurant / hospitality industry is preffered
Strong organization, planning and presentation skills
Highly creative with strong skills in organizing teams into action
Ability to sell new ideas to leadership team
Ability to balance multiple priorities and meet deadlines
Strong foundation of marketing and marketing fundamentals
Attention to detail – ability to flawlessly manage multiple programs
Ability to work in fast-paced environment; accountable and flexible
Strong problem solving abilities; works well with ambiguity

Demonstrates the ability to balance immediate and long-term priorities: seeks to meet critical objectives while considering the impact of those decisions and activities on the ability to achieve long-term goals WHAT’S IN IT FOR ME?: Dave & Buster’s / Main Event is an imaginative and dynamic company dedicated to creating innovative entertainment experiences that bring joy, laughter, and excitement to people of all ages
Responsibilities: Director of Brand Marketing to build brand partnership strategy across all business streams – Eat, Drink, Play and Watch – to build brand relevance
Stay on top of trends in culture and proactively recommend partnership and/or activation ideas; be the brand steward and advocate of ‘culture hijacking.’
Maintain relationships with existing partners, and cultivate new relationships with emerging brands that would be a good partner fit for D&B
Negotiate and manage all aspects of partnership agreements to ensure flawless execution including trade and deal terms
Create business briefs for partnership activations that help creative, media, and digital teams to create strong go-to-market marketing campaigns
Serve as day-to-day project manager on partnership initiatives with the oversight of the Sr
Effectively communicate and manage cross-functional teams and/or agency partners on project goals and deliverables
Responsible for on-time and on-budget delivery, contingency plans, and post-mortem learnings
Act as a brand steward, having a deep knowledge of the brand architecture, positioning, and guest targets, and applying this consistently across all marketing activities
Thrive in a fast-paced environment and are comfortable navigating ambiguity
Benefits: Exclusive discounts on food and games at Dave & Buster’s / Main Event Paid Time Off (PTO) that increases with tenure
11 Company Holidays (Includes your Birthday) & 2 Floating Holidays per year

Medical, dental, vision and voluntary benefits Part Time/Full Time benefits available Sub Benefits: Livongo, SurgeryPlus, and Telehealth benefits 401k with company match following 6 months of employment
Buster’s Legacy Fund (Support Team Members during difficult Times) Employee Assistance Program (EAP) Offerings
